node.name: Perucian Hills
node.description: The Mordilian Legion has attempted to flank the Idonian Army. Get there fast enough to stop them from gaining ground and invading Eir.

node.name: Temples of Bahar
node.description: The Temples of Bahar used to be serene and filled with the soft air of chanting. The Dark War has turned this place of worship into a bloodbath.

node.name: Eiran Farmlands
node.description: A few enemy squads have been reported terrorizing farmland in this area.

node.name: Minas Zenoth
node.description: Minas Zenith provides crucial visibility for miles around. Force the Dark Counsel out of the area and give Eir the eyes it needs.

node.name: Irbryn
node.description: The Irbryn Peninsula was known for its vibrant coastal culture. Put an end to the recent attacks on its beaches.

node.name: Faerhorn
node.description: Every morning, the Monks of Faerhorn blow massive horns that can be heard hundreds of miles away. The horns haven't been heard for a few days now...

node.name: Brookden
node.description: A whimsical and bright place, the Dark Council has a special hatred for Brookden's happy atmosphere.

node.name: Ianthian Border
node.description: The enemies along the Ianthian and Urudin border carry a strange message that death is to the North...

node.name: Verisia
node.description: The Verisian Light's perpetual glow has turned its people into insomniacs. Enemy forces are trying to cover the Light and plunge Verisia into darkness.

node.name: Ianthia
node.description: Welcome to Ianthia, the largest province in Idonia with the most powerful warriors. Hail Hildegard!

node.name: Ordalea
node.description: Home to the Faction of Ordalea, an elite group of warriors priding itself on the slaughter of Dark Forces.

node.name: Frosthaven
node.description: With an icy climate, Frosthaven is the closest Ianthian establishment to The White Peaks...and Mount Etosus.

node.name: Port of Syana
node.description: Syana is a host to many trading ships that carry exotic foods, animals, and materials from far away lands.

node.name: Ithe
node.description: Ithe has been a trading capital since Atla's establishment. It currently only trades in war and destruction.

node.name: Booty
node.description: Victory! Your journey is now complete. Wait another day and you will be able to try again!

node.name: Milstone
node.description: Although this town is located in Ianthia, Milstone's inhabitants are mostly skilled woodsmen.

node.name: Furwood
node.description: After the invasion by Azfor's minions, Furwood is slowly recovering its population and moral.

node.name: Roda
node.description: Roda is the information capital of Idonia. Mercenaries, spies, and assassins call this place home.

node.name: Forbidden Pier
node.description: Little is known about this ghost town. However,  rumor has it that treasure may lie somewhere nearby.

node.name: Erador
node.description: Decades of war has been fought on Idonia's soil and it is now your turn to fight back. You are needed desperately on the front lines of Urudin.

node.name: Musou
node.description: An insane sorceress who speaks of a magical talisman that gives divine power. Musou has spent her entire life searching for this talisman. This has sent her into a fury.

node.name: Jag
node.description: Jag started as an abandoned feline whom the legendary sorceror, Azfor, kept as a pet.

node.name: Rocko
node.description: Rocko's origins herald from the White Peaks. He is made of granite, diamond, crystal, and limestone; how he became so is a mystery.

node.name: Onasus
node.description: Onasus is a central point for Idonian forces as it is a production center for weapons, potions, and magical objects. However, it has made Onasus a target for Dark Council leaders.

node.name: Treasure of Ianthia
node.description: A special box that is full of surprises. Rewards include gold, tokens, and a good chance to earn an epic item!

node.name: Viz
node.description: Viz was once a revered and iconic warrior of Ianthia who became disgruntled after the sorcerors of the Dark Forces cast spells on him to lose his body, but retain his spirit.

node.name: Rykor
node.description: As Azfor's personal assistant, Rykor sought to have as much power as Azfor, and after pestering his superior enough times, Azfor granted Rykor life beyond death.

node.name: Hulio and Julianna
node.description: A union of love and destruction, they were acquainted during a raid in Ithe, and the rest of their tale tells of corruption, greed, and hatred.

node.name: Cajal
node.description: Condemned by the Holy Circle of Hildegard, Cajal was once a noble knight who was corrupted by the greed of the Dark Council.

node.name: Treasure of Urudin
node.description: A special box that is full of surprises. Rewards include gold, tokens, and a good chance to earn an epic item!

node.name: Treasure of Eir
node.description: A special box that is full of surprises. Rewards include gold, tokens, and a good chance to earn an epic item!

node.name: Treasure of Linnaean Sands
node.description: A special box that is full of surprises. Rewards include gold, tokens, and a good chance to earn an epic item!

node.name: Treasure of Atla
node.description: A special box that is full of surprises. Rewards include gold, tokens, and a good chance to earn an epic item!

node.name: Tristle
node.description: The most liberal city in idonia. Members of different races and species come here to elope.

node.name: X
node.description: X was named after the classic symbol for assassins. Two bloody daggers were crossed to warn weaklings to stay away.

node.name: First Base
node.description: The first step to treasure is always the hardest.

node.name: Second Base
node.description: Although tiring and unrewarding, it is necessary to just suck it up and keep going.

node.name: Third Base
node.description: Things are starting to perk up. One more step to victory.

node.name: Hortel
node.description: He once was a revered member of the Dark Council, but fell after First Disbanding. Hortel is now the leader of the Dark Legion, a position he earned out of pity.
